answers.text:
The City of Virginia Beach has a City Auditor who reports to City Council.  The Office is responsible for financial and program performance audits, oversight of the City's external audit contract, and r for investigating reports of fraud, waste and abuse.  You can find additional information:
http://www.vbgov.com/government/departments/city-auditors-office/Pages/default.aspx

answers.author: Creighton Avila
answers.text:
Toni,
I have worked for three different local governments  in North Carolina (two counties and one city) and each had an internal audit function. The City of Greensboro has an Internal Audit Division that is located in the Executive Department. One county I worked for had a person who did internal audit functions and that person worked in the Finance Department. The other county had an Internal Audit Department and that department reported to the county manager. 
I hope this helps.
